original_text: “Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you build the tombs of the prophets and decorate the monuments of the righteous,
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 너희는 선지자들의 무덤을 만들고 의인들의 비석을 꾸미며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites!
For you build the tombs of the prophets
and decorate the monuments of the righteous,
